snippet.title: ZENONZARD: Artificial Card Intelligence Basic Rule (ENGLISH)
snippet.description:
In Zenonzard, players work together with their Buddy ACI using mana to summon minions and attack their opponents life points. Once your life points reach 0, it's game over!

There are many different ways to gain an advantage over your opponent, but today I'm going to introduce three of the core components of a Zenonzard battle.

◆Mana Movement
Minions can move between two areas: the base, which is the area where mana is displayed, and the field, which is the area in which battles take place.

◆Flash Phase
This is your chance to counterattack during your opponent's turn!

◆Force
Players select two Forces when constructing a deck. Forces are available from the start of the battle and can greatly influence the way you play. 
Each Force has a different effect on the battle, so be sure to keep that in mind when coming up with a strategy or building a deck!


- Websites & Social Media
Official Website: https://www.aicarddass.com/zenonzard/en/
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZenonZ_official
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zenonzard/

Google Play Pre-Registration: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bandai.zzarden



- What is Zenonzard?
Zenonzard is a new style of card battle game featuring a specialized AI dubbed “ACI” or “Artificial Card Intelligence,” with one in-game variation boasting an incredible 99.26% win rate over players in Japan!
But ACI is not just your enemy. You'll be offered a choice of “Buddy AIs” who give advice during battles, offering their input on everything from card choice to offensive and defensive strategies, as well as helping you construct decks and analyse past matches, too.
